scenario_text.value: You’re scared too, Kunemon? Stay close to me.

They killed their comrades to advance.
Who would do such a thing?

What unnatural thing could have killed so
many?

(Arukenimon could barely handle us. Could she
have have killed so many enemies here?)

(And why would Arukenimon want to kill these
creatures?)

Look, everyone. The noise is more distinct
over there.
It must have been a recent kill.

The sense is strong, and seems to be moving
in that direction.

(Further into the complex? Away from the
factory we’re headed to?)

Sorry to rush you, but we don’t have time.
Let’s follow the traces where they lead.
